strong.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 24px;

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 18px;
font-size: 18px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;
font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);
font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);
color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;
font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);
color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;
font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 显卡超频就是提高这个频率

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;
font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 最影响性能的参数是流处理器和架构

span.style: font-size: 18px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;
font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 公版显卡是英伟达或者AMD官方出售的显卡，以稳定著称

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";

p.span: 非公版显卡是其它厂商购买英伟达和AMD显卡芯片包装，主要差异是散热和外观

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;
color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: N卡是英伟达的显卡芯片，比如GTX450，GTX1080Ti，RTX2080TI等

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: A卡是AMD的显卡芯片，比如RX580，RX VAGE 56

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: A卡性能比高于N卡，但是N卡销量大，大部分游戏对N卡的优化更好，所以一来二去二者就差不多了
